dblp.social.utility
Class SubsetCreator

java.lang.Object
  dblp.social.utility.SubsetCreator

public class SubsetCreator
extends java.lang.Object

A simple class which generates a subset of dblp.xml for testing purposes

Author:
Staffiero

static void articleTagsFinder()
          Creates a subset containing all the article tags in the dblp.xml file.

          Creates a simple subset of dblp.xml writing the first encountered tags until the subset dimension reaches SUBSET_SIZE.

createSimpleSubset

public static void createSimpleSubset()
                               throws java.io.IOException
Creates a simple subset of dblp.xml writing the first encountered tags until the subset dimension reaches SUBSET_SIZE.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

mitTagsFinder

public static void mitTagsFinder()
                          throws java.io.IOException
Creates a subset containing all the mit-tags in the dblp.xml file. A mit-tag is a main tag whose url contains the string "http://theory.lcs.mit.edu/".

Throws:
java.io.IOException

articleTagsFinder

public static void articleTagsFinder()
                              throws java.io.IOException
Creates a subset containing all the article tags in the dblp.xml file.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
